subject: Simsonn GT2 Racing Simulator Steering Wheel S1
description_text:
hi will the 
Simsonn GT2 Racing Simulator Steering Wheel S1 fit the thrustmaster gt2 to be used on ps5

Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi Terry Allen,   Our pedals can only connect to a PC via USB. On a PC, they are compatible with all steering wheels, so each device is an independent USB and fully compatible with the PC.
